short_summary: 1-year standing offer for mobile welding services for minor construction and maintenance field supplies
description: The furnishing of all labour, materials, equipment and transportation required to carry out miscellaneous welding services for minor construction and maintenance fabrications or repairs to buildings, building equipment and systems at 14 Wing Greenwood as and when requested.
full_summary:
------------

**Mobile Welding Repairs (Request for Standing Offer)**
======================================================

**Reference Number:** WS3962714106-Doc3962805112
**Published:** April 14, 2023
**Closing Date:** May 10, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT

**Supply Services**
-------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking a contractor to provide mobile welding repairs to the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Services Required**
--------------------

The Contractor will be responsible for furnishing all labour, materials, equipment, and transportation required to carry out miscellaneous welding services for minor construction and maintenance fabrications or repairs to buildings, building equipment, and systems at 14 Wing Greenwood. This will include various welding services, as described in the detailed specification.

**Term of Contract**
------------------

The Request for Standing Offer (RISO) will be for a one (1) year initial period with three (3) 1-year option periods.

**Inquiries**
------------

Inquiries of a technical nature and all questions of a contractual nature should be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority, Kate Mintzer, at kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. Inquiries must be received at least five (5) calendar days prior to the closing date.

**Location**
------------

The Contracting Authority is located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For general information, contact Kate Mintzer, Contracting Authority, at kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Note**
------

A detailed specification outlining the requirements and evaluation criteria can be found on the Government of Canada's procurement website, at the following URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16000636?extsite=MTYwMDA2MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16000636?extsite=MTYwMDA2MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Related Trade Agreements**
---------------------------

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific
